title: The The Adventure Zone Zone: Amnesty Wrap-Up!
description: We’re answering some questions about The Adventure Zone: Amnesty in this bonus episode, and talking very, very briefly about our next season! It’s called Graduation, and it launches next week!
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
content:encoded: We’re answering some questions about The Adventure Zone: Amnesty in this bonus episode, and talking very, very briefly about our next season! It’s called Graduation, and it launches next week!
